name: Website Performance for Everyone – Cache, Speed, DB Backups & optimizations and more
author: wppfe

sections.description:
üöÄ Performance for Everyone is the ultimate plugin for optimizing your WordPress website’s speed and performance. It’s built to empower website owners, developers, and agencies to boost their site’s speed by cleaning up databases, optimizing JavaScript, managing caching, and much more.

‚ö° Key Features:

  1. Cache Optimization:

    • Cache pages, posts, and products for faster loading.
    • Minifies HTML automatically on cache
    • If WooCommerce is activated, you can also cache product pages.
    • Easily clear the cache manually for better performance.

  2. Database Settings:

    • Clean up your database by removing unnecessary data such as post revisions, spam comments, transient options, and orphaned metadata.
    • Run optimization queries to defragment database tables, ensuring efficient data management.
    • Review and clean the wp_options table to ensure only essential data is autoloaded.
    • Regularly clean up term relationships and other unused data for a more streamlined database.
    • Backup your database before performing cleanups and monitor database performance, including size and optimization results before and after cleanup.

  3. JavaScript Settings:

    • Disable jQuery Migrate and embedded scripts for a leaner codebase.
    • Add ‘defer’ to JS scripts to prioritize content loading.

  4. General Settings:

    • Enable Gzip compression to shrink file sizes sent from your server.
    • Disable default emoji scripts for a cleaner, faster site.

  5. Speed Test:

    • Measure your website‚Äôs loading speed for both mobile and desktop.
    • Get insights and identify issues that may impact your site’s performance.
    • Access a performance dashboard with real-time data, including page load times and optimization suggestions.

  6. Images:

    • Preload images for better performance.

üåü Upcoming Features ‚è≥:

  • Advanced JavaScript and CSS compression
  • Advanced page preloading for faster navigation
  • Browser caching enhancements
  • CDN Integration
  • Scheduled Database Cleanups
  • Assets Manager
  • Database Health Automatic Monitoring
  • WooCommerce-Specific Optimizations
  • Browser Caching Enhancements
  • Priority Support
  • Critical CSS generator
  • Image CDN Integration
  • Advanced Page Preloading
  • Keeping Database backups in Cloud Service

Third-Party Services

This plugin uses the following third-party services:

  1. Google PageSpeed Insights API
    • Purpose: This plugin relies on the Google PageSpeed Insights API to measure the performance of your website. When you click the “Measure My Website Performance” button, the plugin sends your website URL to the Google PageSpeed Insights service to retrieve performance data.
    • Data Sent: Your website URL is sent to the Google PageSpeed Insights service.
    • Service Link: Google PageSpeed Insights
    • Privacy Policy: Google Privacy Policy
    • Terms of Use: Google PageSpeed API Terms of Use

Additional Information

  • üìã License: GPLv2 or later.
  • üí¨ Support: If you need assistance, feel free to reach out via WPPFE.com.
sections.installation:
üöÄ To install and start optimizing your website:

  1. Download the plugin from the WordPress plugin directory or upload the performance-for-everyone folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Navigate to Performance to configure the plugin to suit your optimization needs.
  4. Start optimizing your website by enabling caching, cleaning up the database, and running performance tests.
sections.faq:
‚ùì How do I cache my website‚Äôs pages and posts?

Go to Performance > Cache Settings and enable the options to cache pages, posts, and products. You can also choose the cache expiration time and clear the cache manually when needed.

üîÑ How do I clean up my database?

Under Performance > Database Cleaner, select the types of data you want to remove, such as old revisions, spam comments, or transient data. Click “Run Cleanup” to optimize your database.

üìù Can I measure my website’s loading time?

Yes! The plugin provides a real-time performance dashboard where you can see the loading time of your website. It also offers recommendations for further optimizations.

üì± Is the plugin optimized for mobile devices?

Yes! Performance for Everyone includes features like lazy loading and responsive optimizations to ensure fast loading times on mobile devices.

‚öôÔ∏è How does the plugin help with JavaScript and CSS optimization?

The plugin can minify and combine your JavaScript and CSS files, which reduces file size and the number of requests your site makes, improving overall load speed.

üåê Can I use Gzip compression with this plugin?

Absolutely! The plugin allows you to enable Gzip compression under Performance > Gzip Settings, which will reduce the size of the files sent to your users and improve loading times.
